room_title: Escape room "Beyond the Wardrobe" by Greatest Escape in Lancaster (CA)
room_description:
Thrown head-first into a world of magic, mythical beasts and talking animals you become a part of the story of legends.

It's up to you and your team to escape the clutches of the evil, white witch and her castle and rescue the animals she's turned to ice...before you become a part of her collection.

Step into the story, raise your sword and become a hero in this 60 minute adventure. Donâ€™t just read the tales. Experience them. Do you have the courage to see what lies Beyond the Wardrobe?
